Nagisa Chairman, lead your excellent political and artillery troops to carefully go through this time of trouble. If you evangelize Trinity's religion with a powerful army, you will bring out the harmony of the age of conflict and division.

Chairman Mika, the world will be kneeling under your force. If you see a chance, even if you are a friendly civilization, proclaim a surprise war. With the unwavering faith and unwavering faith, you will conquer and rule all the people of the world.

Chairman Seia, believe in your sense. Preempt the location of the resource and block the enemy's approach. You are a wise president, lead the Trinity to a bright future with your resources and knowledge.
